title: Teriyaki salmon
description: This teriyaki salmon recipe is on the table in five simple steps. Perfect for a quick weeknight supper.This meal provides 524 kcal, 35.5g protein, 39.5g carbohydrate (of which 14.5g sugars), 24.9g fat (of which 4.5g saturates), 1.4g fibre and 5.8g salt per portion.
